title: Who is Kern Pharma? Three Wins and Counting for Vuelta Giant-Killers
content:
'This is a dream:' A trio of stage wins and nine other top-10s through 18 stages slot the team's Vuelta among the best ever for a wild card team in modern grand tour racing history.Â 

Read the full article at Who is Kern Pharma? Three Wins and Counting for Vuelta Giant-Killers on Velo.
author: ahood
